content: As an AI language model, I do not have access to up-to-date information on the specific strategies that Hartford is using to attract new businesses. However, in general, cities often use a variety of tactics to encourage economic development and business growth. These may include tax incentives or breaks, infrastructure investment, workforce development programs, and marketing and outreach efforts to promote the city's strengths and amenities. Additionally, cities may partner with local universities or research institutions to support startup companies and foster innovation within targeted industries. It is also common for cities to work closely with local business organizations, such as chambers of commerce or economic development councils, to identify and address barriers to business growth and attract new investment to the area.
